placeDescriptions.placeDescription: Heptonstall chapelry is formed of five townships.
Heptonstall township, centered on the village, encompassed part of Hebden Bridge and the lands along Widdop road and Edge Lane. Its border with Stansfield township lay along the Colden Water.
The village of Heptonstall sits on the hilltop above Hebden Bridge. First mentioned in the 13th century, it formed part of the *rectorial* manor of Halifax-cum-Heptonstall.
